## Other Requirements and Recommendations
- Bring a device to class that can connect to the internet (phone, tablet, laptop, etc).
- Textbook & online homework system are FREE!
  - You <i>may</i> purchase the recommended Stewart <i>Essential Calculus</i>, Early Transcendentals, second edition, but you do not have to for this class.
- Materials recommendations:
	- 1 notebook for notes, 1 notebook for homework
	
## Homework
- Online through MyOpenMath
- 10 tries per question, no penalty
- A few written questions for which you upload work
- Message the Instructor!

## Calculators
- In general, not allowed!
- If allowed on homework, calculator will be embedded.
- Never allowed on exams.
